text: Moderator: So I guess maybe now, you can like have a taste of the two MM's.
Moderator : I also. I don't know whether it is different. (putting things away and standing up to pick MM's to check if everyone get the different flavor of chocolate.)
Moderator: Yeah, maybe you got like the same flavor or something.
Moderator: the same?
Participant 1: Mine is unusual.
Moderator: I know it is the third.
Participant 5: That's the peanut butter.
Professor: The darker color one should be peanut butter. And the bright color one should be candy corn. So I think candy corn is the new flavor possibly for Halloween.
Moderator (walking around to check if every get different flavor of MM's): So everybody got the different one.
Moderator: You have tasted the different, right? ( Moderator take one for herself but get dropped. Some laughs.)
Participant 1: The lighter one is more like a white chocolate. More like white chocolate than the candy taste. And that white one is more sweet.Â
Moderator: The lighter one?
Participant 1: Sweeter. Yeah.
Participant 5: The candy corn. (Agreement from others too)
Participant 5: too chemical taste. (shaking his head)
Moderator: Too chemical taste? How about other feel about the candy taste? The candy one.
Moderator gets up to have more candies.
Moderator: How about the other feel about the candy taste?
Participant 2: Too sweet. (Some agreeable voice from others)
Moderator: Too sweet?
Participant 2: It's like the white chocolate. But I don't usually like white chocolate.
Moderator: You don't like chocolate.
Participant 2 nodded.
Participant 3: Technically, white chocolate isn't chocolate.
Moderator: Really?
Participant 3: Yes.They have no coco in white chocolate.
Participant 1: So white chocolate is just candy?
Participant 3: I don't know, but there are no, definitely no coco in the white chocolate.
Moderator: So, how about the others?
Participant 4: Actually, I don't really like eating the cover of it. I love to eat the soft one. en, Like the kisses chocolate.)
(With supporting voice from the Moderator)Participant 4: Yeah, I like that feeling. And I don't like breaking some and eating that.
Moderator: Did this like the sound of pouring them that you don't like that.
Participant 4: Yeah, just like the feeling the chocolate melting in my mouth (With right hand moving toward her mouth). Yeah, I enjoy that feeling.
Moderator: So do you like think, do you consider MM's as chocolate or ?
Participant 4: Yeah. When I eat this, I'm just think they are nice chocolate.
Participant 4:But I don't like the cover. Moderator: How about the others with it?
Participant 7: I would say I prefer the chocolate one, not the brighter one.
Moderator: You mean the darker one.
Participant 7: Yeah.(nodded)
Moderator: the peanut butter one?
Participant 7: Yeah, yeah. (nodded)
Participant 7: Yeah, I am love that more. This(light color one) is so sweet. It's kind of weird.
Moderator: Weird?
Participant 7: to eat some other flavor of MM's.
Moderator: Other flavors. But how do you feel about other flavors?
Participant 7: No.(shaking head) It tastes not good.
Moderator: Tastes not good. Weird.
Participant: (nodded) yeah.
Moderator: So, how about other like the peanut butter flavor.You have the comparisons.
Participant 3: I think both of them have the unpleasant taste. It's kind of drying and a little bit burning in your mouth.
Moderator: Burning?
Participant 3: Yeah, a little bit, a little bit. It's very salt and dry. You have to drink some water after you eat bunch of MM's.
Moderator: Both of them.
Participant 3: Yes, both.
Moderator: So do MM's, old MM's?
Participant 3:Yes, all the MM's. Just one thing I don't like MM's compared to other normal chocolates.
Participant 3: I don't know what creates that kind of feel, but I don't kind of (like it). Eating too much, you have to drink some water or you feel little dry.
Moderator: Yeah, so how about the others feel, comparing with the peanut butter one and the light one?
Participant 6: I have thought that experience, because I have a ulceration in my tongue, so it hurts.
(some laughs)Moderator: So need water or something
Participant 6: So I am not sensitive to the flavor.
Moderator: OK, so you don't do very feel about it.
Participant 6: I think the peanut butter one is much more sweet.
Moderator: much more sweet?
Moderator: How about the others?

Participant 1: I think the lighter one is sweeter. But I just prefer the original one. And I don't like if the MM's combine these two in a single package bag. I personally don't want that. Purposely the by lighter one.
Moderator: en, en.
Participant: the lighter one.
Moderator: You prefer the small one?
Participant: yeah. But I don't mind if you combine them in a single package.
Moderator: yeah. So why do you more prefer the original one.
Participant 1: Maybe it is because it is more familiar.
Moderator: familiar?
Participant 1: yeah. (nodded)
Moderator: Other reason for like the peanut butter one?
